title: codegen/lto-removes-invokes.rs test fails
body:
On a fresh clone of the Github repository, the codegen/lto-removes-invokes.rs test fails with the following output:

```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ./x.py test --stage 1 src/test/codegen --test-args lto-remove  
Updating only changed submodules
Submodules updated in 0.03 seconds
    Finished dev [unoptimized] target(s) in 0.22s

    Finished release [optimized] target(s) in 0.22s                                                                                                                                            
Copying stage1 test from stage1 (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu / x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
Building stage0 tool compiletest (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
    Finished release [optimized] target(s) in 0.22s                                                                                                                                            
Check compiletest suite=codegen mode=codegen (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -> x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)

running 1 test
F
```

Here is my config.toml file: http://termbin.com/ek7z

The config file is taken from https://rust-lang-nursery.github.io/rustc-guide/how-to-build-and-run.html#create-a-configtoml
